## Description
 &#10;&#9;&#9;Lime is a calcium-containing inorganic&#10;&#9;&#9;material in which carbonates, oxides, and hydroxides predominate. In the&#10;&#9;&#9;strict sense of the term, lime is CaO or Ca(OH)2.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Chemical|
|Form:|Solid|
